# Story Title

## User Story
As a **[role]**, I want **[capability]** so that **[benefit]**.

## Context & Problem
Brief context (2-3 sentences)

## Acceptance Criteria
**Scenario: [Name]**
- Given [context]
- When [action] 
- Then [outcome]

## Success Metrics (MUST)
- Measurable outcomes

## Scope
